mav_sim.chap10.run_sim module¶

Run the chapter 10 simulation mavsim_python

  • Chapter 10 assignment for Beard & McLain, PUP, 2012

  • Last Update:

    2/2/2019 - RWB 2/22 - GND

mav_sim.chap10.run_sim.run_sim(sim: MsgSimParams, path_fnc: Callable[[float, MsgState], MsgPath], init_state: DynamicState | None = None, path_view: PathViewer | None = None, data_view: DataViewer | None = None) → tuple[PathViewer, DataViewer]¶

Runs the chapter 10 simulation

Parameters:

  • sim – Timing and file parameters for the simulation

  • path_fnc – Function that takes in time and state and returns the path to be followed by uav

  • init_state – Initial state of the MAV

  • path_view – Viewing window to be used for the mav and its associated path

  • data_view – Viewing window to be used for the states

Returns:

Viewing window to be used for the mav and its associated path data_view: Viewing window to be used for the states

Return type:

path_view

mav_sim
